entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 01:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: NE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
